title: Exploring Manali
content: Manali is a beautiful hill station with snow peaks and rivers.
author: Aditi

title: A Weekend in Goa
content: Goa is famous for its beaches, nightlife, and seafood.
author: Rahul

title: Discovering Jaipur
content: Jaipur, the Pink City, is known for its palaces, forts, and rich culture.
author: Sneha
